TopicTitle: I would like to delete my account

Articles.Content:
I think the title is pretty self-explanatory
I am not exactly sure what to do, as there isn't any mod post for account deletion, and posting this on the renaming thread would be off-topic
I searched for a bit through the forums and I think I have to PM a mod for deleting the account, but before that I want to be sure that I'm doing this right :V
We could ban your account, if you wish, but we customarily do not delete them because it removes important information from our records.
And also, do you have a reason for wanting your account to be deleted? I'm not trying to be rude or anything, but why do you want your account deleted.

Please let the moderators deal with this. 

SrKomodo, you can PM a moderator to discuss this further.
